Title: Relates to the sales and use tax exemption for certain transactions in precious metal bullion held for investment purposes
Summary: Requires that sales tax exempt precious metal bullion shall be purchased by a bank, a foreign government, the U.N. or the state, federal or local government.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the sales and use tax exemption for certain transactions in precious metal bullion held for investment purposes
